deeprules
=========

.. py:module:: deeprules

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Package implementing rule induction algorithm capable of learning rulesets with mixed
   CNF (and or or's) and DNF (or of and's) rules.

   It is capable of learning rulesets for classification, regression and survival data,
   handling both nominal and numerical attributes.
